questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Project Management Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: PMO (Project Management Office) is a key concept in Project Management Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the CompTIA Project+ exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with classify project roles and responsibilities. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any project management concepts task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Project Management Concepts is most closely related to compare and contrast standard project phases?
options: Project Management Concepts governance and oversight
Project Management Concepts implementation and operations
Project Management Concepts assessment and testing
questions.explanation: Compare and contrast standard project phases falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Project Management Concepts.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Project Management Concepts (Domain 1)?

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with identify common project team organizational structures?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with identify common project team organizational structures, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Explain common project constraints" in Project Management Concepts?
